mapper.select: select bigId as "id" , bigParentId as "parentId" , vcKind as "kind" , vcName as "name" , vcCode as "code" , vcSymbol as "symbol" , vcPath as "path" , vcUrl as "url" , isLeaf as "leaf" , intLevel as "level" , intOrder as "order" , vcOuPath as "ouPath" , vcCreateUser as "createUser" , dtCreateTime as "createTime" , vcModifyUser as "modifyUser" , dtModifyTime as "modifyTime" , vcRemark as "remark" from tbPrivilege
